segments.text: Good evening . I've come to see Miss Morrison
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! Good evening . I'm sorry , but she is not in . She's gone out to the theatre
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! I've just come back from Canada and I've brought a parcel from her parents
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was preparing my supper but I've finished now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can leave the parcel with you , can't I ?
segments.speaker: S1
